Text:
No Korean shit subtitles, yes?  

2.6 gb is just the right size for me -- 4 gb doesn't show well on my comp, and less than 2gb is a bit pixelated.  Please help seed!
Not Korean sub at all. English hardcoded when needed.

Ok finished dl, it looks beautiful.  Note:  there are NO extra subtitles on the film (other than the ones put there by hollywood).

V10 
A10
